data.title: Imre Kertész – Prize presentation
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 2002 was awarded to Imre Kertész "for writing that upholds the fragile experience of the individual against the barbaric arbitrariness of history"
data.text:
Imre Kertész

Prize presentation

Your browser does not support the video tag.

Watch a video clip of the 2002 Nobel Laureate in Literature, Imre Kertész, receiving his Nobel Prize medal and diploma during the Nobel Prize Award Ceremony at the Concert Hall in Stockholm, Sweden, on 10 December 2002.

To cite this section

MLA style: Imre Kertész – Prize presentation. NobelPrize.org. Nobel Prize Outreach AB 2024. Mon. 22 Jul 2024. <https://www.nobelprize.org/prizes/literature/2002/kertesz/prize-presentation/>
